code: import{createContext,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Context=createContext();export function ContextProvider({children}){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[lastUpdate,setLastUpdate]=useState("");const[search,setSearch]=useState("");const[toggleView,setToggleView]=useState(1);const[favouritesList,setFavouritesList]=useState([]);const searchedData=data.filter(item=>{return item.title.label.includes(search);});const handleToggleListView=()=>{setToggleView(1);};const handleToggleColumnView=()=>{setToggleView(2);};const handleAddToFav=album=>{setFavouritesList([...favouritesList,album]);};const handleRemoveFromFav=album=>{const favList=favouritesList.filter(item=>item.id.attributes["im:id"]!==album.id.attributes["im:id"]);setFavouritesList(favList);};const isExistInFav=album=>{if(favouritesList.filter(item=>item.id.attributes["im:id"]===album.id.attributes["im:id"]).length>0){return true;}return false;};return _jsx(Context.Provider,{value:{data,setData,isLoading,setLoading,lastUpdate,setLastUpdate,search,setSearch,toggleView,setToggleView,favouritesList,setFavouritesList,searchedData,handleToggleListView,handleToggleColumnView,handleAddToFav,handleRemoveFromFav,isExistInFav},children:children});}export default Context;
